Package com.pathfinder.racetrack.view

Class MapPainter

java.lang.Object
com.pathfinder.racetrack.view.util.MapPainter
public class MapPainter
extends Object
MapPainter updates/draws the Map View of the game

      Draws the possible moves for the player of a given car
      Parameters:
      drawOn - Where to draw it on
      car - The possible moves of this car will be painted
      Returns:
